articles.title: Stipe Miocic motivated by underdog role vs. UFC champ Jon Jones: 'I'm the guy that puts a big dagger in that' - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: "I love being told something is not gonna happen because I'm the guy that puts a big dagger in that," Stipe Micic says of his future showdown with Jon Jones.
articles.content:
Stipe Miocic relishes being underestimated against Jon Jones.
Miocic (20-4 MMA, 14-4 UFC) is expected to get the next shot at newly crowned heavyweight champion Jones (27-1 MMA, 21-1 UFC), and has o… [+1757 chars]
